meanings.definition: The outer covering of the birch tree, used for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: The birchbarks on the tree looked smooth and white.
meanings.sent2: She collected birchbarks to make a natural decoration.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made a cozy nest with the birchbarks.
meanings.sent4: The birchbarks whispered secrets in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The children crafted boats from the birchbarks and sailed them in the pond.

meanings.definition: A type of paper made from the bark of the birch tree.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted on birchbarks for a unique effect.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a letter on delicate birchbarks.
meanings.sent3: The teacher surprised the class by writing on birchbarks instead of regular paper.
meanings.sent4: Her words on the birchbarks carried a message of hope.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scroll was written on birchbarks and revealed a forgotten tale.
